vsParam:
Thank you, [px]!
Now I just need to bring these medicines to the village!

Yeah. The villagers will be relieved when they
see you delivering medicines to them.

No... It's just, what Captain said earlier,
hit me hard and awakened me...

What a knight ought to do is not just protecting people,
it must be their spiritual support too...

After the Captain's guidance, I figured it all out... Those knights
protecting my hometown, also provided spiritual care for us...

Hehehe... Ha ha ha ha!
Ha ha ha ha ha!?

Uh, what's wrong with you, Cresson!?
Why you suddenly laugh like that!?
Does Peppermint have something on her face!?

No... Hehe. I just realize that it takes more efforts
than I could imagine to become a knight of my dream...

You are right...
But I have faith in you.

Yeah. Think about it,
even that Tandrion was once a knight, right?

Compared to him... right? Although you are a guard now,
you are way more chivalrous than him.

Ha ha, indeed! From this angle,
maybe being a knight is easier than you think.

No no, that's not true!
The Captain is noble man with chivalry!

But... er.
I must become a knight one day.

The most powerful knight in the kingdom... who is powerful
enough to protect everyone and strong enough to be their...
spiritual support.

That's right, that's our Cresson!
You must work harder to get there, huh?

Sure! When I deliver the medicines,
I'll look for my Captain and start training!

I'll hurry to the village then!
Thanks, guys!

The most powerful knight in the kingdom... huh?
Hehe, maybe Cresson will realize his goal pretty soon.

Hehe, yeah.
Let's all pray for him to reach his goal earlier.

Hehe, I can't stand him. What a troublesome subordinate.
But that also shows his worth... Ha-ha.
